mosaics.title: SCH-55-22B Gunflint Fm stromatolite
mosaics.description: Microfossiliferous chert from the ~1.9 Ga Gunflint Formation, Ontario, Canada. Zoom to explore filamentous and spheroidal fossil bacteria in one of Stanley Tyler's original discovery samples.

mosaics.title: SCH-55-22B 3D Explorer
mosaics.description: Gunflint Formation stromatolite at 50× — 21 Z-planes, 3 channels. Pan and zoom to locate a target, zoom all the way in, and click Load 3D to explore depth.
